page_subtitle: A bosom friend afar brings a distant land near
rule_mutual: - Before applying, please **make sure** your site has a link to mine. If you remove my link after approval, I will also remove yours and add you to the blacklist.
rule_unavailable: - If the site is inaccessible for a long time, I will remove your link. You can reapply after recovery.
rule_content: - Ensure your website has no politically sensitive issues or illegal content, not too many ads, no malware or scripts, and reprinted articles must credit the source.
rule_https: - Ensure your site has HTTPS enabled globally
rule_domain: - You need your own independent domain. Public subdomains or free domains are not accepted (e.g., github.io, vercel.app, eu.org, js.cool, .tk, .ml, .cf, etc.)
rule_personal: - Commercial and non-personal websites are not accepted
